attr.title: Shovel Knight: Standalone Editions
attr.desc: Shovel Knight standalone edition(s) loader. This port is for anyone who owns various standalone editions of Shovel Knight such as Shovel of Hope, Plague of Shadows, Specter of Torment, King of Cards, and Showdown. Upon loading, you will be prompted to select from the detected gamedata. Not compatible with Treasure Trove.
attr.inst: You must have (at minimun) one the Shovel Knight standalone games (Shovel of Hope, Plague of Shadows, Specter of Torment, King of Cards, Showdown) for Linux copied to the 'ports/shovelknight-se/gamedata' folder.
